snippet.title: MotoGP™  - Official Trailer | Race Against Legendary Riders!
snippet.description:
Now you can become a MotoGP™ sensation and race against Valentino Rossi, Jorge Lorenzo, and Marc Marquez in the all-new MotoGP™ arcade simulator, created by the world's largest arcade game manufacturer in the US, Raw Thrills.

Lean into turns on an authentic MotoGP™ motorcycle and take your shot at racing against famous riders or up to eight of your friends. This game features a stunning HD display, a player-facing camera, and a mounted fan to let you and your friends feel the thrill of the fastest bikes in the world. Online connectivity allows STAT tracking to see how you stack up against your competition, and you can also race other riders locally or in other locations!

Game Features:

- Front-facing camera for an immersive experience
- Stunning 42" HD display
- Front mounted fan to simulate wind
- Online player STAT tracking
- Available in 4 vibrant colors
- Linkable up to 8 cabinets for multiplayer action
- Authentic MotoGP™ motorcycles
- Officially licensed by MotoGP™
- 3 difficulty levels: Novice, Normal, and Pro
- Race on 10 famous MotoGP™ circuits from around the world

Test your riding skills and experience the ALL NEW MotoGP™ for yourself at an entertainment center near you or purchase your own. Ready, set, GO!

If you enjoyed this trailer, make sure to hit the like button and share it with fellow racing game enthusiasts! Don’t forget to subscribe to our channel and click the notification bell to stay updated with the latest game releases and trailers. Leave a comment below letting us know which MotoGP circuit you're most excited to race on!
